channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- miniOrange Discord Integration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- miniOrange Discord Integration

item.title: CVE-2022-3082|2024-08-03T01:00:10.268Z -- unknown -- miniorange%20discord%20integration
item.description: The miniOrange Discord Integration WordPress plugin before 2.1.6 does not have authorisation and CSRF in some of its AJAX actions, allowing any logged in users, such as subscriber to call them, and disable the app for example
